PowerShellStep.Title: Stop Processes
Remove 32-bit installs from 64-bit installs

Package.Description:
PuTTY is a free implementation of SSH and Telnet for Windows and Unix platforms, along with an xterm terminal emulator. It is written and maintained primarily by Simon Tatham.
Home Page - https://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~sgtatham/putty/
Installation Download - https://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~sgtatham/putty/latest.html
Installation Documentation -
Other Useful Resources

Package.Name: Putty (v1r1) (v0.73)
